downloadTitle: Troubleshooting Microsoft Lync Server 2010 Clients: Help Desk Resource
downloadDescription: This resource is for first-level help desk agents who support Microsoft Lync Server 2010 clients. Note: The .zip file contains both the print documentation and the Help file.
detailsSection:
This resource provides first-level help desk agents who support Lync Server 2010 clients (Microsoft Lync 2010, Microsoft Lync 2010 Attendee, and Microsoft Lync Web App) with the following:
  • A script for opening a service call and identifying the problem the user is having
  • Information about how to resolve more than 200 common user problems
  • Tools and resources for additional troubleshooting
Note: The .zip file contains both the print documentation and the Help file.
systemRequirementsSection:
• The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
Note: The .zip file contains both the print documentation and the Help file.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
